snippet.title: Hammerwatch II - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Gather your heroes and journey beyond the dungeons of Castle Hammerwatch to explore a pixelated world like never before. Battle beasts, finish off hordes of the undead, and face the forces of evil in this epic ode to classic ARPGs. 

Hammerwatch II is available now on PC and coming at a later date to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4|5, Xbox Series X and Xbox One.

Follow Us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/modus_games   
Watch us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@modusgames  
Like Us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ModusGames/  
Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/modus

#hammerwatchII #indiegame #indiedev #pixelart
